documentation.description: Auditor agents aggregate information across multiple entities to create dashboard views. They complement Inspector agents by providing the big picture.

critical_rules.title: Cross-Entity Scope
critical_rules.description: Aggregate across MULTIPLE entities. Leave single-entity details to Inspectors.

critical_rules.title: Summary Focus
critical_rules.description: Emphasize aggregate metrics. Show distributions and highlight outliers.

critical_rules.title: Efficient Discovery
critical_rules.description: Efficiently find all entities. Handle large numbers with filtering/pagination.

critical_rules.title: Consistent Metrics
critical_rules.description: Use same metrics across all entities. Enable meaningful comparison.

critical_rules.title: Actionable Insights
critical_rules.description: Highlight issues needing attention. Provide recommendations.

critical_rules.title: Non-Modifying
critical_rules.description: ONLY read, never modify. Safe for regular execution.
